sen.e: He learnlt kemari from his childhood as there were many good players of kemari in his mother's side of family of Kamo Kannushi, and it is said that he was especially taught by a "saintly kicker, FUJIWARA no Narimichi."

sen.e: His elder borther FUJIWARA no Norinaga was exiled to Hitachi Province as an aide of Emperor Sutoku at the Hogen War, and Yorisuke had to stay in his house in Higashiyama (Kyoto Prefecture) although Yorisuke was not willingly involved in.

sen.e: In 1181 when Kiyomori TAIRA died, insurgencies occurred everywhere in the country and there also occurred revolt in Yorisuke's chigyo-koku (provincial fiefdom) of Bungo.
